hero.subtitle1: Fluxomind is a Brazilian startup created to democratize the use of artificial intelligence in companies of any size.
hero.subtitle2: We are developing an AI-First, no-code platform based on metadata — combining speed, solid architecture, and ease of use.

about.title: About Fluxomind
about.description: We believe that artificial intelligence should be accessible, secure, and scalable. Our mission is to enable companies to build applications, automations, and decision flows intelligently, without depending on technical teams or high investments.
about.platform: The Fluxomind platform abstracts the complexity of development with an artificial intelligence engine, visual automations, and an infrastructure that isolates and protects each client's data. Everything is designed to accelerate the delivery of real value with responsibility and performance.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Democratize software development with artificial intelligence — making system creation accessible to everyone.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be the leading AI-First platform in Latin America, a reference in accessibility, efficiency, and business impact with artificial intelligence.

values.title: Values
list: Respect for users' time and autonomy

technology.title: AI-First Technology
technology.description: Our approach combines generative AI, metadata-based modeling, and a visual building experience so companies can create and evolve their own systems without relying on developers.

generativeAI.title: Generative AI
generativeAI.description: Advanced artificial intelligence technology that enables automatic creation of content and customized solutions.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Intelligent metadata-based modeling that facilitates the creation and maintenance of complex systems.

secureArch.title: Secure Architecture
secureArch.description: Each layer of the platform was designed to be extensible, secure, and ready for enterprise scaling.

technology.footer: From automation flows to how data and layouts are semantically defined, everything was designed for maximum efficiency and ease of use.
